name: Paladin
desc: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath
coolFeatures: Can heal, protect, and motivate others
Can cast divine spells and channel divinity
Can divine smit an opponent for a hard hit
Paladin Oaths include: Conquest, Devotion, Redemption, Ancients, Crown, Vengeance
prompts: Why did you decide to become a paladin?
Are you a devoted servant of good, loyal to the gods of justice and honor, a holy knight in shining armor venturing forth to smite evil?
How did you experience your call to serve as a paladin?
What diety and/or faith do you follow? The Silver Flame, Sovereign Host, Undying Court, or another?
How do you carry out your oath?
Who or what do you swear your oath to and why?
